Package me.kverna.roger.server.notify

Interface Notifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NotifyService
    public interface Notifier
    An interface for dealing with notifications required by the ROGER system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void buzz​(Camera camera, boolean activate)  
      void notify​(Camera camera, java.lang.String description)
      Send a notification to all webhook URLs, using the Camera's name as a title and a given description.
      void notify​(Camera camera, java.lang.String description, byte[] captureFrame)
      Send a notification to all webhook URLs, using the Camera's name as a title and a given description, and provide a JPEG image of a captured frame from the video that should be saved to the database and passed in the notification.
      void notify​(Webhook webhook)
      Send a notification to all webhook URLs with the given Webhook object.
      void notify​(Webhook webhook, WebhookUrl webhookUrl)
      Send a notification to the given webhook URL using the given Webhook object.

    • Method Detail

      • notify

        void notify​(Webhook webhook)
        Send a notification to all webhook URLs with the given Webhook object.
        Parameters:
        webhook - the webhook object to send

      • notify

        void notify​(Camera camera,
            java.lang.String description)
        Send a notification to all webhook URLs, using the Camera's name as a title and a given description.
        Parameters:
        camera - the camera the notification is for
        description - description of the notification

      • notify

        void notify​(Camera camera,
            java.lang.String description,
            byte[] captureFrame)
        Send a notification to all webhook URLs, using the Camera's name as a title and a given description, and provide a JPEG image of a captured frame from the video that should be saved to the database and passed in the notification.
        Parameters:
        camera - the camera the notification is for
        description - description of the notification
        captureFrame - encoded JPEG image to save and send with the notification

      • notify

        void notify​(Webhook webhook,
            WebhookUrl webhookUrl)
        Send a notification to the given webhook URL using the given Webhook object.
        Parameters:
        webhook - the webhook object to send
        webhookUrl - the webhook URL to send to

      • buzz

        void buzz​(Camera camera,
          boolean activate)
